name: Ismael Hishon-Rezaizadeh
bio:
Ismael is the founder of Lagrange Labs an early-stage company focused on applied cryptography research. Lagrange Labs focuses on developing proving systems that enable efficiently proving data-parallel computation (SQL, MapReduce, Spark, etc) run over onchain state.

Lagrange Labs presented their first paper, Recproofs, at Stanford Blockchain Conference (SBC) this August. Lagrange Labs previously raised a seed round led by 1kx in early-2023.
